customer_name: Safari Wild Animal Park and Preserve
site_name: Safari Wild Animal Park and Preserve

citations.narrative:
The first 3-sided shelter structure in the drive thru-park was damaged. The beams and roofing on the left of the front side
are partially hanging and is in disrepair. The shelter needs to be repaired to prevent injury to the animals utilizing the
structure. Correct by December 18, 2025
In the area of the first 3-sided shelter structure in the drive thru park, there were multiple pieces of hay bale twine
scattered on the ground. If the animals ingest the twine, it can be harmful. The hay bale twine should be removed from the
hay bales to prevent it from being ingested. The outdoor housing areas shall be maintained to protect the animals from
injury. Correct by December 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The first 3-sided shelter structure in the drive thru-park was damaged. The beams and roofing on the left of the front side 
are partially hanging and is in disrepair. The shelter needs to be repaired to prevent injury to the animals utilizing the 
structure. Correct by December 18, 2025 
 
In the area of the first 3-sided shelter structure in the drive thru park, there were multiple pieces of hay bale twine 
scattered on the ground. If the animals ingest the twine, it can be harmful. The hay bale twine should be removed from the 
hay bales to prevent it from being ingested. The outdoor housing areas shall be maintained to protect the animals from 
injury. Correct by December 1, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
